Publications

I work on a diverse range of topics which are essential to our understanding of galaxy formation and evolution: from global gravitational instabilities and the effects of AGN feedback on galactic dynamics, to the formation of star clusters and the first galaxies during the Epoch of Reionisation.

Here, you can find an up-to-date list of my work sorted based on citation count. A pdf version of my CV can be found here (last edited April 2023).

First author publications

✎

  • The effects of AGN feedback on the structural and dynamical properties of Milky Way-mass galaxies in cosmological simulations
    Irodotou, Fragkoudi, Pakmor, Grand, Gadotti, Costa, Springel, Gómez, Marinacci

  • Using angular momentum maps to detect kinematically distinct galactic components
    Irodotou & Thomas

  • Morphological evolution and galactic sizes in the L-Galaxies SA model
    Irodotou, Thomas, Henriques, Sargent, Hislop

Co-authored publications

✎

  • The growth of intermediate mass black holes through tidal captures and tidal disruption events
    Rizzuto, Naab, Rantala, Johansson, Ostriker, Stone, Liao, Irodotou
  • Modelling the accretion and feedback of supermassive black hole binaries in gas-rich galaxy mergers
    Liao, Johansson, Mannerkoski, Irodotou, Rizzuto, McAlpine, Rantala, Rawlings, Sawala
  • First light and reionization epoch simulations (FLARES) V: the redshift frontier
    Wilkins, Vijayan, Lovell, Roper, Irodotou, Caruana, Seeyave, Kuusisto, Thomas, Parris
  • First Light And Reionisation Epoch Simulations (FLARES) VII: The Star Formation and Metal Enrichment Histories of Galaxies in the early Universe
    Wilkins, Vijayan, Lovell, Roper, Zackrisson, Irodotou, Seeyave, Kuusisto, Thomas, Caruana, Conselice
  • Baryonic Effects on Lagrangian Clustering and Angular Momentum Reconstruction
    Sheng, Yu, Li, Liao, Du, Wang, Wang, Xu, Genel, Irodotou
  • First Light and Reionisation Epoch Simulations (FLARES) - VI. The colour evolution of galaxies z = 5-15
    Wilkins, Vijayan, Lovell, Roper, Irodotou, Caruana, Seeyave, Kuusisto, Thomas
  • First Light And Reionisation Epoch Simulations (FLARES) - IV. The size evolution of galaxies at z ≥ 5
    Roper, Lovell, Vijayan, Marshall, Irodotou, Kuusisto, Thomas, Wilkins
  • The challenge of simulating the star cluster population of dwarf galaxies with resolved interstellar medium
    Hislop, Naab, Steinwandel, Lahén, Irodotou, Johansson, Walch
  • First Light And Reionization Epoch Simulations (FLARES) - II. The photometric properties of high-redshift galaxies
    Vijayan, Lovell, Wilkins, Thomas, Barnes, Irodotou , Kuusisto, Roper
  • First Light And Reionization Epoch Simulations (FLARES) - I. Environmental dependence of high-redshift galaxy evolution
    Lovell, Vijayan, Thomas, Wilkins, Barnes, Irodotou , Roper
